description: This table contains refund request activity history information for payments that have been refunded.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: Payment transaction (ETR) ID that was refunded.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REF_REQ_HX_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time of refund request activity.

columns.name: REF_REQ_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who performed the refund request activity.

columns.name: REF_REQ_HX_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The refund request activity performed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Requested


Reviewed


Approved


Declined


Posted

columns.name: REF_REQ_HX_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment associated with the refund request activity.

columns.name: REF_REQ_HX_REF_NUM
columns.description: The refund number of the refund request.
